line_1: Then sunk beneath, and as she disappear'd,
line_2: Cete well-pleas'd thus far the Tritons heard,

line_1: Then sunk beneath, and as she disappear'd,
line_2: On Chalcis smil'd, for Chalcis was preferr'd;

line_1: She had done some Fault, so, blushing, disappear'd.
line_2: She saw him fix'd, the doubtful Virgin fear'd

line_1: I came — but soon the phantoms disappear'd;
line_2: Far other scenes, than wanton Hope had rear'd;
So spake th'Omnipotent. The spirit heard,

line_1: My Vision ceas'd, the Spectres disappear'd.
line_2: But when, at length, your friendly Voice I heard,
